title: Ticket #5238: Implement transfer_[checkpoint|intermediate]_files.
description: It would be a large UI improvement to permit the user to specify their output and checkpoint (or intermediate) files distinctly from each other. Specifying transfer_[checkpoint|intermediate]_files should neither imply nor require setting when_to_transfer_files to ON_EXIT_OR_EVICT, at least if the nonperiodic vanilla universe checkpoint attribute(s) are set.
